import{API_URL}from"../../config";// Va chercher tous les posts API
var findAll=function findAll(){return fetch(API_URL+"/posts",{method:"GET",headers:{Accept:"Application/json"}}).then(function(res){return res.json();});};var findOne=function findOne(id){return fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/posts/").concat(id)).then(function(res){return res.json();});};export default{findAll:findAll,findOne:findOne};
